metadata.name: "Control"
metadata.description:
Work from a collection
In the name of "movement" year 2018-2019.
The works in the series deal with different characters while deeply observing the relationship between the body and the mind, the dynamics created by the movement with the viewer to convey the interiority of the performer.

The work Control talks about the inner need for a certain control over the body's position - a situation is created that operates between devotion and resistance
